fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Single market
eu_initiatives:
We lobby mostly concerning: 
- intermediation in banking and investment services 
- MiFID II (selling rules - precontractual information) 
- IDD (selling rules - information obligation - professional requirements - registration) 
- PRIIPs
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: BZB is member of the European Federation of Financial Advisers and Financial Intermediaries (FECIF).
goals__remit: The goal of our organisation is defending the interests of the self-employed financial intermediaries (tied agents banking and investment services and insurance intermediaries).
